xml.title: Mobile Outlaw Daily Dashboard - $date
xml.description:
This report provides daily stats for outlaw. The daily stats are as follows:
o DAU o Installs o MAU o Engagement o D1, D7, D30 Retention o Revenue o Game Activity
The report shows day on day (DoD) and week on week (WoW) % changes as well as 30 day trends.
NOTE: FTUE and Gun purchase/upgrade trends reflect install cohorts of the last 7 days.
xml.query: select 'DAU' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash where metric='dau' group by 1 union select 'Installs' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash where metric='installs' group by 1 union select 'MAU' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash where metric='mau' group by 1 union select 'Revenue' as Metric, concat('$',format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),2)) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash where metric='revenue' group by 1 union select 'Revenue/DAU' as Metric, concat('$',format(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),3)) as Value, concat(format(100*(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end))/ (sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end))-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end))/ (sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end))-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash where metric in('revenue','dau') group by 1 order by 1 ;
